00005 int main()
00006 {
00007         // Create new GLFW window
00008         GLFWManager* pWindowManager = new GLFWManager();
00009 
00010         // Create new camera object
00011         Camera* camera = new Camera();
00012 
00013         GameControlEngine engine;
00014         engine.SetWindowManager(pWindowManager);
00015 
00016         // Pass camera object into engine
00017         engine.SetCamera(camera);
00018         pWindowManager->GetInputManager()->SetCamera(camera);
00019         
00020         return engine.RunEngine();
00021 }

00023 int GLFWManager::Initialize(int width, int height, std::string strTitle, bool bFullScreen)
00024 {
00025         if (!glfwInit()) 
00026         {
00027                 std::cout << "Failed to initialize GLFW!" << std::endl;
00028                 return -1;
00029         }
00030 
00031         // GLFW setup
00032         glfwWindowHint(GLFW_CONTEXT_VERSION_MAJOR, 3);
00033         glfwWindowHint(GLFW_CONTEXT_VERSION_MINOR, 3);
00034         glfwWindowHint(GLFW_OPENGL_PROFILE, GLFW_OPENGL_CORE_PROFILE);
00035 
00036         // Create a window
00037         m_window = glfwCreateWindow(width, height, strTitle.c_str(), nullptr, nullptr);
00038 
00039         // Make sure the window is valid
00040         if (m_window == nullptr)
00041         {
00042                 std::cout << "Failed to create a GLFW window! Press any key to continue!" << std::endl;
00043                 system("Pause");
00044                 Destroy();
00045 
00046                 return -1;
00047         }
00048 
00049         // Sets window user pointer
00050         glfwSetWindowUserPointer(m_window, this);
00051 
00052         glfwMakeContextCurrent(m_window);
00053         glfwSetInputMode(m_window, GLFW_STICKY_KEYS, GL_TRUE);
00054 
00055         // Cursor properties
00056         glfwSetInputMode(m_window, GLFW_CURSOR, GLFW_CURSOR_DISABLED);
00057         glfwSetCursorPos(m_window, 0, 0);
00058         glfwSetScrollCallback(m_window, scroll_callback);
00059 
00060         // Turn of V-Sync
00061         glfwSwapInterval(0);
00062 
00063         glewExperimental = GL_TRUE;
00064 
00065         GLenum err = glewInit();
00066         if ( GLEW_OK != err )
00067         {
00068                 std::cout << "Failed to initialize glew!" << std::endl;
00069                 return -1;
00070         }
00071 
00072         srand(time(NULL));
00073         return 0;
00074 }

00076 void GLFWManager::SwapTheBuffers()
00077 {
00078         glfwSwapBuffers(m_window);
00079 }
00080 
00081 // This function processes all the application's input and returns a bool to tell us if we should continue
00082 bool GLFWManager::ProcessInput(bool continueGame = true)
00083 {
00084         // Use the GLFW function to check for the user pressing the Escape button, as well as a window close event.
00085         if (glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_ESCAPE) == GLFW_PRESS || glfwWindowShouldClose(m_window) != 0)
00086                 return false;
00087 
00088         if (glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_UP) || glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_W))
00089                 m_inputManager.KeyPressed(InputCodes::Up);
00090         if (glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_DOWN) || glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_S))
00091                 m_inputManager.KeyPressed(InputCodes::Down);
00092         if (glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_LEFT) || glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_A))
00093                 m_inputManager.KeyPressed(InputCodes::Left);
00094         if (glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_RIGHT) || glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_D))
00095                 m_inputManager.KeyPressed(InputCodes::Right);
00096 
00097         // Used to toggle wireframe, Q to toggle on and E to toggle off
00098         if (glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_Q))
00099                 m_inputManager.KeyPressed(InputCodes::q);
00100         if (glfwGetKey(m_window, GLFW_KEY_E))
00101                 m_inputManager.KeyPressed(InputCodes::e);
00102 
00103         // Mouse position
00104         double mouseX, mouseY;
00105 
00106         // Current mouse position
00107         glfwGetCursorPos(m_window, &mouseX, &mouseY);
00108         
00109         glfwSetCursorPos(m_window, 0, 0);
00110 
00111         // Tell input manager the mouse button has been (is being) clicked
00112         if (glfwGetMouseButton(m_window, GLFW_MOUSE_BUTTON_LEFT))
00113                 m_inputManager.MousePressed(InputCodes::MouseButtonLeft, (float)mouseX, (float)mouseY);
00114         if (glfwGetMouseButton(m_window, GLFW_MOUSE_BUTTON_RIGHT))
00115                 m_inputManager.MousePressed(InputCodes::MouseButtonRight, (float)mouseX, (float)mouseY);
00116 
00117         glfwPollEvents();
00118 
00119         return continueGame;
00120 }
00121 
00122 void GLFWManager::Destroy()
00123 {
00124         glfwTerminate();
